@description: Official english language package for OMMP.
module_disabled: This module does not exists or is disabled!
wrong_skh_explain: A security issue has been detected and this request has been blocked.
404_error_explain: The requested page or file does not exist or you do not have permission to access it!
@default_right.use#desc: Allow this group to use this module
@default_right.use_media#desc: Allow this group to access the static media of this module (this right alone does not allow to use the module or its API)
administrators_description: The administrators group is the group for users with rights to all platform actions.
classic_users_description: The Classic Users group is the default user group.
visitors_description: The visitors group allows you to assign rights to users not connected to the platform.
cannot_move_files: Cannot move module files to destination
wrong_ommp_version: This version of OMMP is too old for this module
cant_update_to_lower: Unable to update to older version
cannot_backup_current_module: Unable to save current module files
update_module_error: The module encountered an error while updating it. This error is not caused by OMMP, please contact the module developer. The module may no longer work correctly, if you encounter problems uninstall and reinstall it.
